title: Eromanga-sensei (Eromanga Sensei)
synopsis: One year ago, Sagiri Izumi became step-siblings with Masamune Izumi. But the sudden death of their parents tears their new family apart, resulting in Sagiri becoming a shut-in which cut her off from her brother and society.
characters: ['Izumi, Sagiri', 'Izumi, Masamune', 'Gokou, Ruri', 'Kousaka, Kirino', 'Kousaka, Kyousuke', 'Yamada, Elf', 'Makishima, Saori', 'Jinno, Megumi', 'Senju, Muramasa', 'Takasago, Tomoe']
